constraints.name: alternating_sum_zero
constraints.description: 交替求和必须为零（即 a1 - a2 + a3 - a4 + ... = 0）

constraints.name: subsequence_constraint
constraints.description: 子序列的交替求和必须为零（即在给定区间 [l, r] 内，a_l - a_(l+1) + a_(l+2) - ... ± a_r = 0）

constraints.name: min_removal_for_zero_sum
constraints.description: 移除最少数量的元素以使剩余元素的交替求和为零
constraints.formal: min |S| such that ∑(i in S) (-1)^(i-1) * a_i = 0
